entries.content: A powerful text-to-image AI model that generates images based on text descriptions. It's known for its versatility and ability to create high-quality images across various styles and subjects.

In the context of Stable Diffusion, a prompt is a text description used to generate an image. Effective prompts are typically detailed and specific, including information about subject, style, lighting, mood, and composition.

Refers to the artistic style of the generated image. This can include specific art movements (e.g., impressionism, art nouveau), mediums (e.g., oil painting, watercolor), or even artists' names to emulate their style.
